name: order-history.toml

description.summary: View order history by phone number

rawContent:
# Order History Route
# View past orders

[route]
id = "order-history"
path = "/prototype/client/history"
title = "Order History"

[page]
type = "public"
role = "client"

[page.description]
summary = "View order history by phone number"
features = [
  "List of past orders",
  "Order details",
  "Review option for completed orders"
]

[relations]
guards = ["public"]
roles = ["client"]
entities = ["order", "review"]
platforms = ["client-app"]

[implementation]
component = "OrderHistory"
file = "src/prototype/pages/client/OrderHistory.tsx"
status = "planned"
